column8: prompt
column9: resp

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。The arcade employs more than a dozen part-time workers. They constantly rotate the locations and numbers of the prizes in this arcade of almost 100 ping. There are more than 80 machines here, and 90% contain snacks. There’s a parking lot in the basement, so no need to fear how consumers will cart away their mountains of winnings. The chain arcade has almost 10 locations nationwide, and at weekends, they’re full to bursting.
column9: 這個遊樂場雇用了十多位兼職員工。他們不斷地調換這個近100坪的遊樂場裡的獎品位置和數量。這裡有超過80台機器，而90%的機器裡都有零食。地下室有停車場，因此消費者不用擔心如何將他們贏得的獎品帶回家。這家連鎖遊樂場在全國有近10個地點，並且在週末時，他們都會客滿為患。

column8: 幫我將以下英文文章翻譯成中文：The company is marketing its new technology to designers, who can use it to view architectural mockups or machinery components in 3D right on the screen. All the latest technologies are on show at this year’s CES.
column9: 這家公司正在將其新科技推廣給設計師們，他們可以利用這項科技在螢幕上立即查看建築模型或機械組件的3D形象。所有最新的科技都在今年的CES展覽中展出。

column8: 以下提供英文文章，請幫我翻譯成中文：This second-hand car has been gradually retrofitted into an eye-catching shape. After 10 years, it has 360,000 kilometers on the clock and has already had a new engine fitted. And it’s covered with mementoes from races.
column9: 這輛二手車已經逐漸改裝成一個引人注目的形狀。在經過10年之後，它的里程數已達360,000公里，並且已經裝上了新的引擎。而且，它上面覆蓋著賽事的紀念物。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Dongshan coffee is famous for its unique position, and the constant refinement of production methods. The flavor is admired by many caffeine afficionados.
column9: 東山咖啡因其獨特的產地位置以及不斷精進的生產方法而聞名。其風味受到許多咖啡愛好者的讚賞。

column8: 幫我將以下文章翻譯成中文：Preparations are underway in Taipei, the host of the 2023 Taiwan Lantern Festival. Installations will light up the streets of the city’s east district and Xinyi District starting Feb. 5. One of the main attractions will be a massive light-up statue of a rabbit, which will be located on top of one of the exits of Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall Station. Let’s hear from the artist behind the exhibit.
column9: 在台北，2023年台灣燈會的準備工作已經開始進行。藝術裝置將從2月5日開始照亮該市的東區和信義區的街道。其中一個主要景點將是一座巨大的兔子發光雕像，它將位於中山紀念堂站的一個出口之上。讓我們來聽聽這個展覽的藝術家的想法。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Ever since a strong earthquake hit Turkey four days ago, the Taiwan-Reyhanli Centre for World Citizens, a Taiwanese NGO based in Turkey, has provided shelter to scores of earthquake survivors. The center, which was originally a community center for Syrian refugees, now takes in about 300 to 400 people a day. The center’s head Chiu Chen-yu returned to Taiwan on Thursday night and is now appealing for funds and more resources, so that his center can continue providing post-disaster relief.
column9: 自從四天前一場強烈地震襲擊土耳其以來，位於土耳其的台灣NGO—台灣-雷漢里世界公民中心，已為大量的地震倖存者提供了庇護。這個中心原本是為敘利亞難民設立的社區中心，現在每天接收約300到400人。該中心的負責人邱鎮宇於週四晚上返回台灣，並現在正在呼籲籌募資金和更多的資源，以便他的中心能繼續提供災後救援。

column8: 能否幫我將以下文字翻譯成中文？This has led to a backup of luggage and cargo as well as delays of 59 flights at Taoyuan International Airport, affecting more than 3,000 travelers. EVA Air says it has arranged with other ground handling companies to assist with manpower, and that the delays have gradually eased. It also apologized to passengers for the inconvenience caused.
column9: 這導致了桃園國際機場的行李和貨物累積以及59架航班的延誤，影響了超過3,000名旅客。長榮航空表示，它已與其他地勤公司協調以提供人力支援，並且延誤狀況已逐漸緩解。長榮航空也對乘客因此所造成的不便表示歉意。

column8: 以下提供英文文章，請幫我翻譯成中文：Today, in our art spotlight series, we meet art gallery founders Tina Keng and Shelly Wu. Keng is the founder of a well-known gallery in Taiwan called Tina Keng Gallery. Her daughter Shelly Wu also runs a successful gallery called TKG+ Gallery. Wu’s gallery hopes to showcase the work of Asian artists and bring them to the international stage. FTV reporter Stephany Yang met the mother-daughter duo to find out more.
column9: 今天，在我們的藝術聚光燈系列中，我們遇到了藝術畫廊創始人康雅雯（Tina Keng）和吳怡萱（Shelly Wu）。康雅雯是台灣知名畫廊「康雅雯畫廊」的創始人。她的女兒吳怡萱也經營著一家成功的畫廊名為「TKG+畫廊」。吳怡萱的畫廊希望展示亞洲藝術家的作品，並將他們推向國際舞台。菲視新聞記者楊淑芬（Stephany Yang）訪問了這對母女檔，以瞭解更多。

column8: 幫我將以下英文文章翻譯成中文：Lots of us have rolled up our sleeves to get extra vaccinations in recent years. But now, after COVID-19, doctors say other vaccines are important - like pertussis.
column9: 我們中的許多人在近年來已經挽起袖子接種了額外的疫苗。但現在，在新冠病毒之後，醫生表示其他的疫苗也很重要，例如百日咳疫苗。

column8: 幫我將以下文章翻譯成中文：Taipei played host to the annual India Spring Fair this year, bringing Indian food, dance and other parts of Indian culture to people in the capital. The event this year was attended by foreign minister Joseph Wu, and FTV’s president Dorothy Wang, who said she was delighted by the Indian dances, both traditional and modern, that were on display at the event.
column9: 台北今年作為年度印度春季博覽會的舉辦城市，將印度的食物、舞蹈以及其他印度文化的各部分帶給了首都的民眾。今年的活動由外交部長吳釗燮以及華視總經理王文洋出席，王文洋表示對於活動中展示的印度舞蹈，無論是傳統的或者是現代的，她都感到非常的欣喜。

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。And that goes all the more for clothes that you wear often. Spending some time finding the liquid that suits your family can help ease the transition back into last season’s wardrobe.
column9: 這尤其適用於你經常穿的衣服。花點時間找出適合你家庭的洗衣液，可以幫助讓過渡回上個季度的衣櫥變得更輕鬆。

column8: 幫我將以下文章翻譯成中文：Altogether, five magpies are enjoying the poolside ambience, a whole magpie family. They take it in turns to approach the water and enjoy a luxury dip.
column9: 總共有五隻喜鵲正在享受泳池邊的氣氛，這是一整個喜鵲家族。它們輪流走近水邊，享受奢華的浸泡。

column8: 以下是一篇英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。 In addition, there are sneakers from the Air Jordan History of Flight series, as well as shoes signed or worn by former NBA stars Shaquille O’Neal, Scottie Pippen, Penny Hardaway, and others.
column9: 此外，這裡還有來自Air Jordan歷史飛行系列的運動鞋，以及由前NBA巨星沙奎爾·奧尼爾、斯科蒂·皮蓬、潘尼·哈達威等人簽名或穿過的鞋子。

column8: 請將這段英文翻譯成中文。At the age of 29, Wu Ping-cheng has already tried his hand at many careers. He’s been an executive assistant to a pharmaceuticals manufacturer and a used car dealer. He got his racing license in August 2021 and started competing in October that year. Since then, he’s already bagged lots of trophies.
column9: 29歲的吳平誠已經嘗試過許多職業。他曾是製藥公司的行政助理和二手車商。他在2021年8月取得了賽車執照，並在當年10月開始參賽。從那時起，他已經贏得了許多獎杯。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：Through Taiwan’s borders are open once again, rising international raw material prices, inflation and interest rates are putting a question mark over Taiwan’s prospects for 2023.
column9: 雖然台灣的邊境再次開放，但國際原材料價格的上升，通脹和利率的增加都對台灣2023年的前景提出了問號。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Just when you thought you could put your jacket away, another cool spell is ahead. Meteorologists say another continental cold air mass will arrive. Temperatures are expected to start sliding downwards on Sunday night, with the coldest period between Monday evening and the early hours of Tuesday morning. It could be as low as 10 degrees in Northern Taiwan, while other regions could see big gaps between daytime and nighttime temperatures. The weather is expected to warm up on Tuesday. Let’s hear from the CWB:
column9: 就在你以為可以把外套收起來的時候，又一波涼意即將來臨。氣象學家表示，另一股大陸冷空氣將會抵達。預計從週日晚間開始，氣溫將會下滑，最冷的時段在週一晚間到週二凌晨期間。北台灣的氣溫可能低至10度，而其他地區可能會看到日夜溫差大的情況。預計週二天氣將回暖。讓我們來聽看看中央氣象局的說法：

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：A team of Taiwanese scholars has developed a big upgrade to hearing aid technology. It’s the first system to cut confusing noises from hearing aids using an AI deep learning. The computer scientists from Academia Sinica hope their innovative tools will make hearing aids much more effective, and lead to easier communication for people with hearing problems.
column9: 一隊台灣學者已經開發出一項對助聽器技術的重大升級。這是首個使用AI深度學習來減少助聽器中混亂噪音的系統。來自中央研究院的電腦科學家希望他們的創新工具能夠使助聽器更加有效，並使得聽力有問題的人更易於溝通。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：9 p.m. at a busy intersection in Kaohsiung. Traffic restrictions go into effect, as construction workers start to move this rain tree to a new home, to make space for phase two of the light rail project.
column9: 晚上9點，於高雄一個繁忙的交叉路口。隨著交通管制的實施，為了為輕軌計畫的第二階段騰出空間，工人們開始將這棵雨樹移至新的位置。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。We go now to a tiny restaurant in rural Kaohsiung, where the traditions of Taiwan’s military cuisine are kept alive. Military dependents’ villages were set up for KMT troops and their families in the 1940s. They couldn’t use open fires, so they developed a special cuisine based on gentle methods like steaming. Now a stewardship program is encouraging Kaohsiung residents to move into the old villages, and take care of the historical buildings. One woman to answer the call is Lu Chin-chin. Along with her husband, she’s opened a cozy, traditional eatery, in an old complex first built by the Japanese army.
column9: 我們現在來到高雄鄉下的一家小餐館，在這裡，台灣的軍事烹飪傳統被保留著。軍眷村是在1940年代為國民黨部隊及其家人設立的。他們不能使用明火，因此他們開發了一種基於溫和烹調方式如蒸的特殊菜餚。現在的一項管理計劃鼓勵高雄的居民進入這些舊村莊，並照顧這些歷史建築。回應這個呼籲的一位女性是呂金金。她和丈夫在一個由日本軍隊首次建造的舊的建築群中，開設了一家舒適、傳統的小吃店。

column8: 能幫我把以下文章翻譯成中文嗎？Right now, if you want to take a pet onto Taipei metro, it needs to be put in a carrier. But for just one day, on Apr. 9, Taipei metro will open up special carriages for both pets and owners to amble freely onboard.
column9: 目前，如果您要帶寵物進入台北捷運，需要將其放在運輸籠中。但在4月9日這天，台北捷運將開放特殊的車廂，讓寵物和主人可以自由地在車上活動。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。These foot warmers are so fluffy and soft inside. This young woman is transformed into a brown bear! You can roll up the bottoms to reveal your toes, and easily walk steadily on the floor.
column9: 這些暖腳套非常蓬鬆柔軟。這位年輕女士變身成一隻棕熊！您可以把底部捲起來露出腳趾，並且在地板上穩穩地走路。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：Lawmakers passed the post-pandemic special budget at the legislature last Friday. A handout of NT$6,000 will be available to all citizens by April 6 at the earliest. But have you considered how you’d spend the windfall?
column9: 立法者們上週五在立法機構通過了後疫情特別預算案。所有公民最早從4月6日起將能獲得6,000新台幣的津貼。但你有考慮過你該如何花這筆意外之財嗎？

column8: 能幫我把以下文章翻譯成中文嗎？The Lunar New Year is approaching, which for many employees means it’s time to get their year-end bonuses. One tech company has announced a year-end bonus of 30 months’ pay. Another is giving out bonuses of more than NT$1 million to all employees who’ve been with the company for at least a year.
column9: 農曆新年即將到來，對許多員工來說，這意味著是時候拿到他們的年終獎金了。一家科技公司已宣布發放相當於30個月薪水的年終獎金。另一家則是對在公司任職至少一年的所有員工發放超過新台幣一百萬的獎金。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。This funny advert photo was a hit with netizens. But when we surveyed tourists visiting the farm, most said they wouldn’t apply for the job – it’s not a very practical career move.
column9: 這張有趣的廣告照片在網友中引起了熱烈迴響。但是，當我們對參觀農場的遊客進行調查時，大多數人表示他們不會申請這份工作 - 這並不是一個非常實際的職業選擇。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。Historians in Hualien are thrilled by a surprise discovery. A statue made in 1935 was unearthed in recent construction works. It was originally part of a fountain in front of the original Hualien Railway Station. Although local historian Huang Chia-jung had an inkling the statue might be buried at the site, he was delighted that a bit of routine maintenance, on another piece of public art, brought the lost statue to light.
column9: 花蓮的歷史學家對一項意外的發現感到興奮不已。在最近的建設工程中，他們發現了一個1935年製作的雕像。這個雕像原本是花蓮鐵路站前⽔池的一部分。雖然當地歷史學家黃嘉榮曾經猜想這個雕像可能埋在該地點，但他對於在另一塊公共藝術品的日常維護過程中，無意間找到這個失落的雕像感到非常慶幸。

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。Kaohsiung has set up a drought response center with the central government, as water levels run low. The city says 50 more water wells will be installed around the city, to provide more than 130,000 tons of water a day. But with Southern Taiwan seeing its worst dry spell in 30 years, major challenges could be coming and not just for agriculture.
column9: 高雄已與中央政府一同設立了一個乾旱應變中心，因為該地區的水位變低。該市表示將在城市周圍安裝50個額外的水井，每日可提供超過130,000噸的水。但是，由於南台灣正經歷30年來最嚴重的乾旱，可能會面臨重大的挑戰，而且不僅僅是對農業。

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。Wang’s close relationship with the young carpenters stems from his return to Yuli in 1996, when he began writing annual business plans and applying for subsidies to buy equipment. After 12 years, he finally established a carpentry class at Yudong Junior High School, where he was teaching. He hoped that, through the class, he could inspire young children who lacked interest in studying, to find personal worth through learning carpentry skills. However, after 25 years of efforts to develop a carpentry program at the school, Wang was still challenged by lack of funding for the endeavor.
column9: 王的與年輕木匠的密切關係，源自於他於1996年回到玉里，當時他開始撰寫年度業務計劃並申請補助購買設備。經過12年，他終於在育東國中（他所任教的學校）建立了一個木工班。他希望，通過這個班級，他可以激發那些對學習缺乏興趣的年輕孩子，通過學習木工技能找到自我價值。然而，在花費25年的時間努力在學校發展木工課程後，王仍然面臨資金不足的挑戰。

column8: 我需要一個中文的翻譯。Small Island Big Song is on tour in Taiwan until the end of the year. They will also be performing at the Taipei International Festival of Arts on April 16, 2023.
column9: 「Small Island Big Song」正在台灣巡迴演出，直到今年年底。他們也將在2023年4月16日於台北國際藝術節進行演出。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：Anticipating a market worth NT$6 billion, caterers are rushing to prepare for Spring Festival. Besides complex specialty dishes, traditional favorites are also on the menu.
column9: 預期一個價值新台幣60億的市場，餐飲業者正急忙準備迎接春節。除了複雜的特色菜餚外，傳統的受歡迎菜式也在菜單上。

column8: 以下提供英文文章，請幫我翻譯成中文：These little children are watching everything closely. They can see the performer isn’t reading from a script at all, she memorized the story, using lots of different voices and impressive storytelling techniques. Currently a sixth-grader at Sanxing Elementary in Yilan, Peng Yi-hsin has nystagmus, meaning her eyes move involuntarily. She is almost blind in both eyes, but she won’t let that get in the way of her dreams.
column9: 這些小孩子正在密切地觀察著每一件事物。他們可以看出表演者完全不是在讀劇本，她是背出了故事，並且使用了許多不同的聲音和令人印象深刻的敘事技巧。目前在宜蘭三星國小就讀六年級的彭怡欣患有視網膜震顫，意味著她的眼睛會不自主地移動。她的雙眼幾乎都是盲的，但她不讓這個阻礙她追逐夢想。

column8: 以下是一篇英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。If you’re a vegetarian, maybe you’ll appreciate this mango jalapeno burger. Filled with mildly spicy mango jalapeno sauce, and pico de gallo, a salsa used in Mexico. It also has cucumber and jalapenos on the side.
column9: 如果你是一個素食者，或許你會喜歡這款芒果墨西哥辣椒漢堡。這款漢堡滿載著微辣的芒果墨西哥辣椒醬，還有墨西哥常用的莎莎醬，pico de gallo。此外，它還有附上黃瓜和墨西哥辣椒作為配菜。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。The artist first uses a color pastel to put the foundation on the canvas, then uses his thumb to rub it into a painting, carefully manipulating the strength and direction of the rubbing.
column9: 藝術家首先使用彩色蠟筆在畫布上打底，然後用他的拇指來將其摩擦成一幅畫，細心地操作摩擦的力度和方向。

column8: 我需要一個中文的翻譯。To provide for people with disabilities, this store partnered with the Children Are Us Foundation to hire people from the foundation to work there.
column9: 為了照顧身心障礙者，這家商店與美好明日基金會合作，聘請該基金會的人員在此工作。

column8: 請將這段英文翻譯成中文。This meteorologist explains that from later fall to early spring, or November to March, is the best time of the year to catch the sea of clouds in action. There’s a chance to enjoy a view like this from any of Taiwan’s many high-altitude peaks.
column9: 這位氣象學家解釋，從晚秋到初春，或者從十一月到三月，是欣賞雲海最佳的時節。在台灣的許多高海拔山峰，都有機會欣賞到這樣的景象。

column8: 以下提供英文文章，請幫我翻譯成中文：A steaming-hot Thai lemon fish dish is served. A fresh feast like this takes a lot to prepare. Power is gobbled up by the big fridge, ice machine, air conditioning, the lights in the hall and the signs on the street. The price of electricity went up in April, and saving money is the name of the game for a business like this, which uses more than 1,500 kilowatt-hours a month.
column9: 一道熱騰騰的泰式檸檬魚菜肴被端上桌。像這樣的新鮮盛宴需要花費大量的準備時間。大冰箱、製冰機、空調、大廳燈光以及街頭招牌都需要消耗大量的電力。電價在四月份上漲，對於每月使用超過1500千瓦時的這類業務來說，節省金錢就是遊戲規則。

column8: 請將這段文字翻譯成中文。Here in a vocational high school in Taitung, students are working hard on their moves. Joanna often visits junior high schools to teach performing arts. And here, junior high students link hands to practise a traditional Indigenous dance move. Joanna brings urban dance together with Taiwan’s own dance traditions.
column9: 在台東的一所職業高中，學生們正在努力練習他們的舞蹈動作。Joanna常常去初中校教授表演藝術。在這裡，初中生們手拉手，練習傳統原住民舞蹈的動作。Joanna將都市舞蹈與台灣自己的舞蹈傳統結合在一起。

column8: 請將這段文字翻譯成中文。And Taiwan isn’t just helping with donations and rescue teams. Since the earthquake, about 400 locals have evacuated to the Taiwan-Reyhanli Centre for World Citizens, a community complex in the city of Reyhanli near the Syrian border. The center is run by a Taiwanese nonprofit, and suffered no damages in the quake. It is still able to provide utilities such as water and electricity, but with the large amount of people, it may only be able to provide shelter for another week or two. Let’s hear from the center.
column9: 而台灣不僅只是提供捐款和救援隊幫助。自從地震發生後，大約400名當地人已經疏散到位於近敘利亞邊界的Reyhanli城市的台灣-Reyhanli世界公民中心，該中心是一個社區綜合體。該中心由一家台灣非營利機構運營，並在地震中未受到損失。它仍能提供如水和電等公用設施，但由於人數眾多，它可能只能再提供庇護所一到兩週。讓我們來聽聽該中心的聲音。

column8: 幫我翻譯成中文：The retailers in the plan are: convenience store chains 7-Eleven, Family Mart, Hi-Life and OK Mart; hypermarkets Carrefour, A Mart and RT-Mart; and supermarket chains PX Mart, Funcom, and Simple Mart. Two government-run companies are also part of the plan: Taisugar and Taiyen Biotech. The latter says it will launch its biggest discount programs of the year during the Lunar New Year. Still, with prices of raw materials on the rise, retailers say pressure is on.
column9: 計畫中的零售商包括：便利商店連鎖7-Eleven、全家、萊爾富和OK便利超商；大型量販店家樂福、A購物中心和大潤發；以及超市連鎖品牌全聯福利中心、頂好和美廉社。兩家政府運營的公司也是計畫的一部分：台糖和台鹽生技。後者表示，它將在農曆新年期間推出一年中最大的折扣活動。然而，隨著原料價格的上漲，零售商表示壓力正在增加。

column8: 幫我翻譯成中文：The administration says that due to the broadness and diversity of medical tests and check-ups, they will not be included in the first stage of copay revisions. The matter will be assessed multiple times before a final decision is made.
column9: 行政部門表示，由於醫療檢測和檢查的廣泛性與多樣性，它們不會被列入共享費用修訂的第一階段。在做出最終決定前，這件事將被多次評估。

column8: 幫我將以下英文文章翻譯成中文：In the latter half of 2022 several powerful earthquakes shook the east coast, including one in Taitung on Sept. 18 and another one in Hualien in December. The most recent one was a 4.4 quake on Wednesday morning, off the coast of Yilan. The Central Weather Bureau says it will continue collecting seismic data about Taiwan, urging the general public to not be overly worried, as building codes require structures to be resistant to shaking.
column9: 在2022年下半年，多次強烈地震震動了東海岸，包括9月18日在台東的一次地震，以及12月在花蓮的另一次地震。最近一次是在星期三早上，發生在宜蘭海岸外的4.4級地震。中央氣象局表示，它將繼續收集有關台灣的地震數據，並敦促大眾不要過度擔心，因為建築規範要求結構必須能抵抗震動。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。Cheeky little meerkats emerge from an enclosure and stretch their necks to look around. You can soon visit these furry friends at Kaohsiung’s Shoushan Zoo.
column9: 頑皮的小獴從牠們的空間中鑽出來，伸長脖子四處張望。你不久後就可以在高雄壽山動物園拜訪這些毛茸茸的朋友們。

column8: 能否幫我將以下文字翻譯成中文？Towering above Dashun Road at more than 10 meters tall, this rain tree has stood here more than two decades. The team first pray to the tree and greet it, wishing for a smooth operation tonight. The tree is dug out of the ground, and two cranes are hard at work pruning its branches.
column9: 高聳於大順路上、超過10公尺高的這棵雨樹已經在此地站立了二十多年。團隊首先向樹禱告並問候它，祈望今晚的作業能夠順利。人們將樹從地面挖出，兩台起重機正在辛勤地修剪其樹枝。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。But not all doggos are as amenable to training as Xiaobao. Coffee and cream colored Bobo starts jumping up and down as iy’s given a command, while the bouncy golden retriever Bola gazes cluelessly at the trainer, then dives in for a cuddle.
column9: 但並非所有的狗狗都像小寶那麼愛接受訓練。像是咖啡與奶油色的波波在接到命令時會開始跳來跳去，而活潑的金毛尋回犬波拉會茫然的看著訓練員，然後湧進來尋求親熱的擁抱。

column8: 能否幫我將以下文字翻譯成中文？At this restaurant, you can eat classic Peruvian dishes, such as Peruvian pickled chicken.
column9: 在這家餐廳，你可以品嚐到經典的秘魯菜餚，例如秘魯式醃雞。

column8: 我需要一個中文的翻譯。Taiwan’s pet industry is going from strength to strength. The demand for pet trainers and experts is booming. Today we meet 29-year-old Lia, a pet trainer who specializes in teaching dogs tricks. She posts training videos online, as well as visiting dogs at their home to tutor them in tricks. Her charges learn how to play sports as well as put on a dramatic show. Today we’re going to meet some of her students.
column9: 台灣的寵物產業正日漸壯大。寵物訓練師和專家的需求正在急速增長。今天我們見到了29歲的Lia，她是一位專門教犬類技巧的寵物訓練師。她會在線上發表訓練視頻，也會親自到寵物的家中教導他們技巧。她教導的寵物不僅學會了如何做運動，也學會了如何表演劇目。今天我們將會見到她的一些學生。

column8: 我需要一個中文的翻譯。During the international search-and-rescue missions over the past six days, on Feb. 6 and 7, two Taiwanese rescue teams arrived in Turkey, dispatching a total of 130 people and five detection dogs. Fifty hours after the earthquake, they rescued a survivor trapped in the rubble. Even though the survivor later died, Taiwan’s rescue staff worked incessantly, and just a few hours later, another survivor was rescued from the rubble. Later, for organizational reasons, a Turkish search-and-rescue team took over. At noon on Feb. 9 local time, a Taiwanese team found a third victim trapped under a concrete column. She was successfully rescued after 19 hours of rescue operations.
column9: 在過去的六天中，於二月六日與七日，兩隊台灣的搜救隊伍抵達土耳其，共派出130人和五隻探測犬參加國際搜救任務。地震發生五十小時後，他們從瓦礫中救出一位倖存者。儘管該倖存者後來不幸身亡，但台灣的搜救人員始終不停工作，僅僅幾個小時後，他們又從瓦礫中救出另一位倖存者。後來，基於組織原因，一支土耳其的搜救隊接手進行搜救工作。在當地時間二月九日中午，台灣隊伍在混凝土柱下發現了第三位被困的受害者，經過19個小時的救援行動後，該受害者成功獲救。

column8: 請將這段文字翻譯成中文。As in previous years, the Taipei Flower Market will be open 24 hours a day starting today, until Lunar New Year’s Eve on Saturday. So if you’re looking to buy flowers, even in the middle of the night, you have plenty of options to procure them. The operator of the market, Taipei Flowers Auction, says this year, lilies are a good choice for the Lunar New Year. Let’s hear from the company.
column9: 就像以往的年份一樣，從今天開始，台北花市將會全天24小時開放，直到這週六的農曆新年除夕。所以，如果你想要購買花卉，即使在深夜，你也有很多選擇可以採購。這個市場的經營者，台北花卉拍賣行，表示今年，百合花是農曆新年的不錯選擇。讓我們來聽聽這間公司的說法。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Liu stressed the importance of turning patents into strategic assets for businesses entering the market. Besides ITRI, a memory chip maker was also named a Top 100 Global Innovator for the first time, underscoring the R&D prowess of Taiwan’s private sector.
column9: 劉強調，將專利轉變為進入市場的企業的戰略資產的重要性。除了工業技術研究院外，一家記憶體晶片製造商也首次被評為全球百大創新者，進一步突顯了台灣私營部門的研發實力。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。Another area features sneakers worn by several Taiwan athletes such as Olympic weightlifting gold medalists Kuo Hsin-chun and Hsu Shu-ching, and marathon runner Tommy Chen. There are also shoes collected by celebrities like Jay Chou.
column9: 另一區域展示了數位台灣運動員所穿的運動鞋，例如奧運舉重金牌得主郭婞淳和許淑淨，以及馬拉松跑者陳彥博。這裡也收藏了像周杰倫這樣的名人的鞋子。

column8: 幫我將以下文章翻譯成中文：Between laughs and casual conversation, Wang asks the young carpenters about life at home. To these young men, Wang is not just a mentor, he plays a variety of important roles in their lives.
column9: 在大笑和隨意的對話中，王先生詢問這些年輕木匠們的家庭生活。對這些年輕人而言，王先生不僅僅是他們的導師，他在他們的生活中扮演著各種重要的角色。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。Tiwari says he hopes his photographs will let more Indian people understand Taiwan. He says he looks forward to seeing a Taiwanese photographer go to his home country and do the same, to build a stronger friendship between the two sides.
column9: Tiwari表示，他希望他的攝影作品能讓更多的印度人了解台灣。他期望看到台灣的攝影師能前往他的家鄉進行同樣的行動，以建立兩地之間更緊密的友誼。

column8: 能幫我把以下文章翻譯成中文嗎？Following the devastation caused by Hurricane Lisa in November last year, many areas in the Central American nation of Belize are still under reconstruction. A Taiwanese charity, the Happy Home World Alliance International, has raised funds to help the nation, which is one of Taiwan’s diplomatic allies.Among many donations, the charity has raised NT$300,000 to buy tablet computers, so that Belizean students can learn online and not have their studies interrupted by the aftermath of the hurricane.
column9: 去年十一月，颶風麗莎造成的破壞後，中美洲國家貝里斯的許多區域仍在重建中。台灣的慈善組織「快樂家園世界聯盟國際」已經為這個台灣的外交盟友募集了資金以協助它。在許多捐款中，該慈善機構已成功募得新台幣300,000元，以購買平板電腦，讓貝里斯的學生可以在線學習，不受颶風影響而中斷他們的學業。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。It was hard work to put on such energetic performances and sacrificing their free time to study, but the students say it was all worth it.
column9: 對學生們來說，要表演出如此充滿活力的表演並犧牲他們的空閒時間來學習確實很辛苦，但學生們說這一切都值得。

column8: 幫我翻譯成中文：The black feather chicken comes from Taitung, with its lush forested mountains and abundant rivers. For the residents at this treatment center, learning a trade with connection to the land is a great stepping stone on the road of recovery.
column9: 黑羽雞來自於臺東，那裡擁有翠綠的森林山脈和豐富的河流。對於這個治療中心的居民來說，學習與土地相連的行業是他們康復之路上的一個重要踏板。

column8: 以下提供英文文章，請幫我翻譯成中文：The Ankang site’s circumstances are a result of current laws. Although the Act on Promoting Transitional Justice stipulates that historic sites of injustice should be preserved and restored, it doesn’t specify steps for implementing that. Therefore, officials currently still rely on the Cultural Heritage Preservation Act to seek protection for these sites as cultural assets. However, sites used in the past as prisons often do not meet the standards of cultural assets review committees to be considered cultural assets.
column9: 安康地點的情況是現行法律的結果。雖然促進轉型正義的法案規定應保護和恢復不公正的歷史遺址，但它並未指定實施的步驟。因此，官員目前仍依賴文化資產保存法來尋求這些地點作為文化資產的保護。然而，過去用作監獄的地點通常不符合文化資產審查委員會的標準，無法被認定為文化資產。

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。According to TIER’s latest report, falling demand and inventory adjustments caused exports, production and export orders to fall in November. It was however, a rise from October. Over in the construction sector, it’s been four straight months of downturn, amid high inflation, rising interest rates, and crackdowns on housing speculation. The sector has hit its lowest point since May 2020.
column9: 根據台經研究院的最新報告，需求下滑和庫存調整導致11月的出口、產量和出口訂單都有所下降。然而，這是從10月以來的上升。在建築業方面，由於高通脹、利率上升，以及對房地產投機的打擊，已經連續四個月下滑。該行業已降至2020年5月以來的最低點。

column8: 我需要一個中文的翻譯。Having lived and worked in Taiwan for 23 years, Demir is still passionate about his craft. He says his son will move to Taiwan to help run the business in the future. The family hopes to continue to delight visitors with their creative tricks and teasing, and introduce Turkish culture to more people around the world.
column9: 在台灣生活與工作了23年的Demir，對他的手藝仍然充滿熱情。他表示他的兒子將來會來台灣幫助經營業務。這個家庭希望能透過他們的創意技巧和戲謔，繼續讓訪客感到喜悅，並將土耳其的文化介紹給世界上更多的人。

column8: 幫我翻譯成中文：The clock is ticking down and the kids can’t wait. Following its renovation, the 36-year-old zoo is ready to reopen on Dec. 16. Young and old are all invited to experience the new Shoushan Zoo.
column9: 時鐘正在倒數，孩子們迫不及待。經過翻新後，這個已經36歲的動物園準備在12月16日重新開放。無論老少皆被邀請體驗新的壽山動物園。

column8: 幫我翻譯成中文：A family trip on a ferry. They can gaze out on a wide blue sea from their cabins. For travelers who aren’t satisfied with ferries between Taiwan’s islands, the new island-hopper ferries will shuttle travelers between different countries in Asia. It’s a collaboration between the Maritime and Port Bureau, South Korea and the Philippines.
column9: 一個家庭在渡輪上的旅行。他們可以從他們的船艙望出廣闊的藍色海洋。對於不滿足於台灣島嶼之間的渡輪的旅行者，新的島嶼跳躍渡輪將在亞洲不同國家間穿梭旅行者。這是海洋和港口局、南韓和菲律賓之間的一種合作。

column8: 能幫我把以下文章翻譯成中文嗎？At mealtimes, orders come in thick and fast. The owner, and almost all the employees, each have several jobs to do at once. This service person is wiping the tables down and welcoming new guests inside.
column9: 在用餐時間，訂單湧入如潮水。店主和幾乎所有的員工都必須同時處理幾項工作。這位服務人員正在擦拭桌子並歡迎新客人進入。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Chen Wen-hsiung works deftly on a piece of paper, creating a painting with his fingers in just a few minutes. His first career was as a metalworker, and for many years, art was just a hobby. But he got serious about art in his 50s, and now, as a septuagenarian, his rubbing art is garnering great praise. He invented the technique himself.
column9: 陳文雄熟練地在一張紙上工作，只用幾分鐘，他就用手指創作出一幅畫。他的第一份職業是金屬工人，多年來，藝術只是他的嗜好。但是他在50歲時認真對待藝術，現在，作為一位七旬老者，他的摩擦藝術受到了高度讚揚。這種技術他是自己發明的。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。The team are simulating a rescue mission, using a hanging stretcher to rescue a casualty.
column9: 該團隊正在模擬一次救援任務，他們使用懸掛担架來救援傷者。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。Hsing Yun had devoted his entire life to Buddhism. In his will, he stated that after his passing, there would be no relics or red tape, asking those who miss him to simply write or sing Buddhist songs. More than NT$1 billion in his trust fund will be donated to charitable causes. Fo Guang Shan will open its doors to mourners for seven days starting Monday, with a memorial service to be held on Feb. 13 at 9 a.m. After cremation, Hsing Yun’s remains will be placed in Fo Guang Shan’s Wanshou Garden.
column9: 星雲大師畢生致力於佛教。他在遺囑中表示，他過世後，不會有任何舍利或繁文縟節，希望那些想念他的人只需寫歌或唱佛教歌曲。他的信託基金中超過新台幣10億元將捐贈給慈善事業。佛光山將從星期一開始，為哀悼者開放七天，紀念儀式將於2月13日上午9點舉行。火化後，星雲大師的遺體將被安放在佛光山的萬壽園。

column8: 以下提供英文文章，請幫我翻譯成中文：Fine-dining not your thing? We’ve got you covered. This fast food chain is serving up fried chicken dipped in chocolate sauce and sprinkled with freeze-dried strawberry pieces.
column9: 高級餐飲並非你的最愛？我們已為你想好。這家速食連鎖店正在推出浸泡在巧克力醬並灑上冷凍乾燥草莓塊的炸雞。

column8: 請將這段文字翻譯成中文。With stagflation expected to take over the world next year, Taiwan’s export-oriented economy is in a tough spot. Analysts say the prospects for next year aren’t looking too good.
column9: 預期明年世界將面臨滯脹，以出口為導向的台灣經濟處於困境。分析師表示，明年的前景看來並不太好。

column8: 以下是一篇英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Many older customers are remembering the Japanese-style photos that were common decades ago. The new Korean-style booths don’t have the same appeal exactly, but both provide a chance to capture a special day out for posterity.
column9: 許多年長的顧客仍對幾十年前常見的日式照片留有深刻的記憶。新的韓式攝影棚雖然沒有完全同樣的吸引力，但兩者都提供了捕捉特別日子，留給後世紀念的機會。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。This man speaking fluent Chinese is Joe Baldock, a student at John Hopkins University who previously studied Chinese in Beijing. He had originally planned to do an exchange program in Nanjing this year, but due to the pandemic, he changed his plans and came to Taiwan instead.
column9: 這位能流利說中文的男士是Joe Baldock，他是約翰霍普金斯大學的學生，之前在北京學習過中文。他原本計劃今年要去南京做交換學生，但是由於疫情的關係，他改變了計劃，選擇來台灣。

column8: 請將這段文字翻譯成中文。The Triple Stimulus Vouchers handed out in 2020 allowed applicants to purchase NT$3,000 in time-limited vouchers by paying NT$1,000. That program boosted Taiwan’s GDP by 0.24% to 0.53%. Meanwhile, the Quintuple Stimulus Vouchers of 2021, which gave users NT$5,000 in vouchers, boosted the economy by 0.6% to 0.9%.
column9: 2020年發放的三倍券允許申請者以1000新台幣的價格購買價值3000新台幣的期限限制券。該方案使台灣的GDP增加了0.24%到0.53%。與此同時，2021年的五倍券，為用戶提供5000新台幣的券，刺激了經濟，使之增長了0.6%到0.9%。

column8: 能幫我把以下文章翻譯成中文嗎？The next long holiday will come at the end of February, with the four-day Peace Memorial long weekend. Travel agencies say that currently, Taiwanese travelers are mostly looking to destinations such as Japan, South Korea and Southeast Asia for trips oversees. They say interest levels are about 60% to 70% what they used to be before the pandemic in 2019.
column9: 下一個長假期將在二月底到來，這是四天的和平紀念日長週末。旅行社表示，目前台灣旅客主要將日本、韓國和東南亞等地視為海外旅行的目的地。他們說，相較於2019年大流行疫情之前，現在的興趣程度約為60%到70%。

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。Fresh Thai prawns are deep-fried live; before long they’re covered in crispy batter.
column9: 新鮮的泰國蝦是活生生地炸製的；不久後，它們就被酥脆的麵糊包覆著。

column8: 翻譯成中文：A performer on stilts hands out balloons with glee. Tainan’s Shueijiaoshe Cultural Park has turned into a circus village, and it’s soon to host a ground-breaking circus arts festival.
column9: 一個在木腳上的表演者愉快地分發著氣球。台南的水腳社文化公園已經變成了一個馬戲村，並且即將舉辦一場開創性的馬戲藝術節。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：Taiwan reported 15,409 local COVID infections on Monday. That’s a drop of 9% from the week before, and the seventh day in a row of declining numbers. The CECC says the peak of the current COVID wave is already past. CECC head Victor Wang adding that the government may lift the indoor mask mandate after the Lunar New Year if COVID continues trending down.
column9: 台灣在星期一報告了15,409例本土COVID感染病例。這比前一周下降了9%，且連續七天數字呈下降趨勢。中央流行疫情指揮中心表示，目前的COVID波峰已經過去。中央流行疫情指揮中心負責人王維基補充說，如果新冠肺炎持續呈下降趨勢，政府可能會在農曆新年後解除室內口罩的要求。

column8: 能否幫我將以下文字翻譯成中文？In this risk-averse society, Turner spotted warning signs that amused her, such as those that ban umbrellas on bridges and slippers on escalators.
column9: 在這個謹慎避險的社會裡，特納(Turner)發現一些她覺得有趣的警告標誌，像是禁止在橋上使用傘和在自動扶梯上穿拖鞋。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：New Taipei is working with businesses to offer scholarships and living expenses to talented young athletes from disadvantaged backgrounds. They’ll provide annual scholarships based on the student’s school year. In 2022, 18 students from 15 schools got support to keep following their dreams.
column9: 新北市正在與企業合作，為來自弱勢背景的優秀青年運動員提供獎學金和生活費。他們將根據學生的學年提供年度獎學金。在2022年，來自15所學校的18名學生獲得了支持，以繼續追逐他們的夢想。

column8: 以下是一篇英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Have you ever wondered where to go if you need a pet sitter? Today, we’ll take you to meet the founder of a pet-sitter platform in Taiwan. Candace Chen is the founder of the platform, which she created in 2019. The pet-care app helps pet owners easily find local pet care by matching pets with certified pet sitters in their area. FTV reporter Stephany Yang spoke to Chen to find out more about the platform.
column9: 你是否曾經想過，如果需要寵物保姆該去哪裡找？今天，我們將帶你去見一下台灣一個寵物保姆平台的創辦人。Candace Chen就是這個平台的創始人，她在2019年創建了這個平台。這款寵物照顧應用程式幫助寵物主人輕鬆在當地找到寵物照顧，通過匹配他們區域內的認證寵物保姆。鳳凰衛視記者Stephany Yang與陳進行了交談，以了解該平台的更多信息。

column8: 幫我將以下英文文章翻譯成中文：Working and raising children simultaneously is tough, but now a new childminders’ alliance is giving new childminders professional classes so they can start their own businesses.
column9: 同時工作和養育孩子是艱難的，但現在一個新的托兒所聯盟正在給予新的托兒所工作人員專業課程，使他們可以自己開業。

column8: 幫我翻譯成中文：Taiwan’s premier Indian hybrid dance group was founded in 1994. It’s led by professional dancer and teacher Liu Li-li. After once working in the U.S., in 2013 she led the group to produce Taiwan’s first Bollywood musical. The teaching team have previously won the professional category at the Jinyan Indian Dance Competition, while their students won second place in the amateur category. They have a continuous schedule of public performances.
column9: 台灣首屈一指的印度混合舞蹈團於1994年成立，由專業舞者和教師劉麗麗帶領。曾經在美國工作過後，她在2013年領導該團體製作了台灣首部寶萊塢音樂劇。其教學團隊曾在金燕印度舞蹈比賽中贏得專業組冠軍，而他們的學生在業餘組獲得第二名。他們有持續不斷的公開演出日程。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：Now to the world of dance. Urban dancer Joanna has launched a project to get kids from Taitung’s rural communities into the dance studio. After 20 years pursuing dance all over the world, she’s most excited about bringing it down to earth, and inspiring young people in her native Taitung. She hopes that classes and workshops for rural youth will let them blossom in the world of movement.
column9: 現在讓我們來到舞蹈的世界。都會舞者Joanna已經在台東鄉村社區的孩子中啟動一個項目，將他們引進舞蹈教室。在全世界追求舞蹈20年後，她最興奮的是把舞蹈帶回到平實的生活中，並在她的家鄉台東激發年輕人的靈感。她希望農村青少年的課程和工作坊能讓他们在動作的世界中綻放光彩。

column8: 我有一篇英文文章需要翻譯成中文。An exhibition in Taoyuan is showing off the unusual technique of a late-blooming artist. After a career as a metalworker, Chen Wen-hsiung陳文雄 decided to get serious about his art in his 50s. He invented his own technique of pastel rubbing, which he teaches at schools and older adults’ centers across the city. Now his work, and art by his students, is on show at the Civil Affairs Office of Zhongli District in Taoyuan.
column9: 一個在桃園的展覽正在展示一位晚來的藝術家的不尋常技術。陳文雄在擔任金屬工匠的職業生涯後，決定在50歲時認真對待他的藝術。他創造了他自己的粉彩摩擦技術，並在全市的學校和老年中心教授。現在他的作品，以及他學生的作品，正在桃園中壢區的民政事務所展出。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。Hu, a native of Tainan, moved to Xincheng in 2015, becoming the coach of Xincheng Elementary baseball team. He made this library and lending store of his own books so children had a place to do their homework happily. He lives off the drinks sales. He employs young people in the store, paying them with bed and board. He hopes the store can inject a love of reading that will take root in the town.
column9: 胡先生，一位台南人，2015年搬到新城，成為新城小學的棒球隊教練。他創立了這家圖書館並用自己的書籍提供借閱服務，以便孩子們有一個愉快做功課的地方。他靠賣飲料維生。他在店裡雇用年輕人，以食宿報酬他們。他希望這家店能在城鎮裡植入對閱讀的熱愛。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：Taiwan’s b-boys and b-girls are stepping out into the world, and are all set to make waves at the Paris Olympics. Breakers like those at KGB are setting the stage for future generations to have battles of their own.
column9: 台灣的B-Boys和B-Girls正在走向世界，並準備在巴黎奧運會上引起風潮。像KGB這樣的舞者正在為未來的世代設定舞台，進行他們自己的舞蹈對決。

column8: 能幫我把以下文章翻譯成中文嗎？A Japanese auto giant unveils its latest hydrogen car. Equipped with three hydrogen tanks and a fuel cell, the car generates electricity from a chemical reaction between hydrogen and oxygen that produces no emissions but water. It’s been dubbed the most eco-friendly car yet. Its hydrogen tanks can be refilled in just three to five minutes, giving the vehicle a range of 750 kilometers.
column9: 一家日本汽車巨頭揭示了其最新的氫能汽車。該車配備了三個氫氣罐和一個燃料電池，車輛透過氫和氧的化學反應產生電力，這過程並未產生任何排放物，僅產出水。它已被譽為迄今最環保的汽車。其氫氣罐可以在僅僅三到五分鐘內補充完畢，使得該車輛的續航里程達到750公里。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：The charity lunchboxes are not just a tasty meal, but a way to spread love in the community.
column9: 慈善便當不只是一頓美味的餐點，更是一種在社區傳播愛的方式。

column8: 幫我將以下文章翻譯成中文：Teens born between Jan. 1 and Dec. 31, 2005 are eligible to get a voucher. All they need to do is register on the website of the National Theater and Concert Hall. They can be used to purchase admission to arts and culture exhibitions and shows, cultural experiences, audiovisual entertainment and books and other published materials.
column9: 在2005年1月1日至12月31日出生的青少年有資格獲得一張禮券。他們需要做的就是在國家戲劇和音樂廳的網站上注冊。該禮券可以用於購買入場券參觀藝術和文化展覽和表演，體驗文化活動，享受視聽娛樂，以及購買書籍和其他出版物。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。Although Taiwan had two wins and two losses in the preliminaries – the same as Cuba and Panama -- the nation had a higher loss rate of 31 points, costing it the chance to advance to the quarterfinals in Tokyo.
column9: 雖然台灣在預賽中有兩勝兩敗的成績，與古巴和巴拿馬相同，但是台灣的損失率高達31分，使其失去了晉級東京四分之一決賽的機會。

column8: 幫我將以下文章翻譯成中文：The ECCT Low Carbon Initiative and RE100 Taiwan presented the findings of the report titled, "Taiwan Energy Market Briefing: Net-Zero Plan and Aggregated PPA." The report showed that compared to 2020, there have been improvements in the renewable energy sector in Taiwan. The demand for renewable energy has grown, and more Taiwanese companies are also committing to switching to renewable energy.
column9: ECCT低碳倡議及RE100台灣發表了一份名為 "台灣能源市場簡報：淨零計劃與聚合的PPA"的報告的研究結果。該報告顯示，與2020年相比，台灣的可再生能源領域有所改善。可再生能源的需求增加，且更多的台灣公司也承諾轉用可再生能源。

column8: 能否幫我將以下文字翻譯成中文？Small Island Big Song is a collaborative project that compiles music and stories by Austronesian peoples living is islands across the Indian and Pacific oceans. For many years now, Taiwanese music producer BaoBao Chen and Australian filmmaker Tim Cole have been traveling the world to visit Indigenous artists and sharing the songs of each of their islands. Already, the duo has produced two award-winning albums, which feature music by Indigenous musicians. Small Island Big Song is currently on tour in Taiwan, and FTV reporter Stephany Yang caught up with the producers and musicians to find out more about the project.
column9: 「Small Island Big Song」是一項協作計畫，收錄了澳洲族群在印度洋和太平洋的島嶼上生活的音樂和故事。多年以來，台灣音樂製作人陳寶寶和澳洲電影製片人Tim Cole一直在世界各地訪問原住民藝術家，分享每個島嶼的歌曲。這對二人已經製作了兩張獲獎專輯，內含原住民音樂家的音樂。「Small Island Big Song」目前正在台灣巡迴演出，且富臺電視台記者Stephany Yang追蹤了製作人和音樂家，進一步了解這個項目。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。The storyteller holds a bee in one hand and a bear in the other. She brings their voices to life vividly and the story roars along.
column9: 敘事者一手持蜜蜂，一手握熊。她生動地讓它們的聲音活了起來，並讓故事熱烈地進行下去。

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。Doctors say warning signs to look out for include dizziness, shortness of breath while walking and swollen feet. If you see any of these signs, go to a doctor, as it could mean problems with the tricuspid valve.
column9: 醫生表示，需要留意的警示徵兆包括頭暈、行走時呼吸急促和腳部腫脹。如果您發現上述任何症狀，請立即就醫，因為這可能表示三尖瓣存在問題。

column8: 我需要將這篇英文文章翻譯成中文。Chen was born in Taiwan. After graduating from university, she went to Australia for a working holiday, where she met her husband Tim. She said that one life-changing trip she took during a backpacking trip in 2013 inspired her to start Small Island Big Song. She hopes to unite the Austronesian diaspora through music and let more people know about Taiwan.
column9: 陳女士在台灣出生。她在從大學畢業後，前往澳洲進行工作假期，在那裡她遇到了她的丈夫Tim。她表示，在2013年的一次背包旅行中，她的一次生命改變的旅程啟發她創立了「Small Island Big Song」。她希望透過音樂來團結大洋洲的離散族群，並讓更多人知道關於台灣的事情。

column8: 幫我將以下英文文章翻譯成中文：The food is mainly boiled and stir-fried. The owner of the store hopes to reduce the amount of seasoning as well as retain the original taste of the food. In order to make the meal more flavorful, each meal box has a side of sesame dressing.
column9: 這裡的食物主要是燉煮和炒製的。店主希望減少調料的用量，同時保持食物原本的風味。為了使餐點更具風味，每一個餐盒都附有一份芝麻醬。

column8: 以下是一篇英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。The association says that toys in Taiwan have an average life of six months before they are discarded. It hopes that by collecting, repairing, and distributing these secondhand toys, it can help reduce waste.
column9: 該協會表示，台灣的玩具在被丟棄前平均使用壽命為六個月。該協會希望通過收集、修復和分發這些二手玩具，可以幫助減少浪費。

column8: 請幫我翻譯成中文。The Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation says that pet railings will be used in the trial to separate dogs and cats. There will also be a professional pet trainer on board, ready to step in and support if any animals get into a hairy situation.
column9: 台北快速交通公司表示，將試用寵物欄杆以隔開狗和貓。車上也將有專業的寵物訓練師待命，如果有任何動物陷入困境，他們隨時會介入並提供支援。

column8: 以下提供英文內容，請幫我翻譯成中文。Meanwhile, the agency revised up its expected growth rate for domestic consumption, amid an easing of COVID measures, and the return of shopping, travel and group dining. It expects domestic consumption to grow by 3.29% this year, 0.26 percentage points higher than its previous prediction.
column9: 同時，由於COVID措施的放鬆，購物、旅遊和團體用餐的恢復，該機構調高了其對國內消費增長率的預期。它預計今年國內消費將增長3.29％，比其先前的預測高0.26個百分點。

column8: 請將這段英文翻譯成中文。When you get a pink notice like this, your heart sinks: time to pay a government fine. But look a little closer! It’s actually a wedding invite! What would be the photo of your traffic infraction is actually a photo of the happy couple posing in their finery. The columns inform you of the date and location of the wedding.
column9: 當你收到像這樣的粉紅色通知時，你的心會沉落：該是時候支付政府罰款了。但仔細再看一下！這其實是一張婚禮邀請！你以為是交通違規的照片，其實是這對快樂新人穿著盛裝擺姿態的照片。欄位中則告訴你婚禮的日期和地點。

column8: 能幫我把以下文章翻譯成中文嗎？Over in the foreign exchange market, the new Taiwan dollar closed up NT$0.0231 against the greenback, to close at NT$30.147 against the U.S. unit.
column9: 在外匯市場上，新台幣對美元升值了0.0231元，收在每美元30.147元的價位。

column8: 幫我將以下英文文章翻譯成中文：Inside, a satellite tracking map on the wall allows engineers to constantly monitor where their satellites are. They’re busy checking and editing satellite images, and using this equipment to turn them from 2D into 3D.
column9: 在室內，牆上的衛星追蹤地圖使工程師能夠持續監控他們的衛星位置。他們忙於檢查和編輯衛星圖像，並使用這些設備將它們從二維轉換為三維。

column8: 請翻譯成繁體中文：Analysts say that instability in Hong Kong and China has prompted foreign firms to look to other countries to set up base. Taiwan’s position in the semiconductor sector has made it an attractive option for many firms.
column9: 分析師表示，香港和中國的不穩定性促使外國公司尋找其他國家設立基地。台灣在半導體產業的地位使其成為許多公司的吸引力選項。

column8: 以下提供英文文章，請幫我翻譯成中文：In the headline of her piece, Turner referred to Taiwan as “Asia’s ancient, overlooked and risk-averse island.” She believed few westerners visit Taiwan because of outdated perceptions of its economy and geopolitics. But that’s precisely why British tourists should give Taiwan a chance, she says. Visitors can “defend democracy and freedom by eating the world’s finest dumplings” and “explore ancient Chinese culture somewhere that doesn’t imprison dissidents.” And although described as a “living hell for pedestrians” by some critics, Turner observed that drivers keep to speed limits and pedestrians don’t jaywalk in this “absurdly friendly” country.
column9: 在她的文章標題中，Turner將台灣稱為“亞洲古老、被忽視且風險規避的島嶼”。她認為許多西方人因為對台灣經濟和地緣政治的過時觀念，而很少訪問台灣。但這正是英國觀光客應該給台灣一個機會的原因，她說。遊客可以“透過品嚐全球最好吃的餃子來捍衛民主和自由”和“在一個不會囚禁異議份子的地方探索古老的中國文化”。雖然有些評論家形容台灣是“步行者的活地獄”，但Turner觀察到，在這個“超級友善”的國家裡，司機都會遵守速限，且行人不會亂穿馬路。

column8: 請將這段文字翻譯成中文。The rise of K-pop was noticed more than ever last year on the IFPI Global Artist Chart, with three South Korean groups in the Top 10. One of them was global sensation BTS at No. 2.
column9: 去年在IFPI全球藝人排行榜上，K-pop的崛起受到了前所未有的關注，其中三個南韓團體進入了前10名。其中包括在第二名的全球感動萬分的BTS。
